data.name: Hero_MainSlogan
data.value: More than software – a buddy for life.

data.name: Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Spinner.Net is your personal AI companion who understands you, protects your time, and helps you live the life you want.

data.name: Pillar_Spinnen_Description
data.value: Here ideas, projects and social innovations emerge. Creative spaces and workshops for art, environment, technology and education.

data.name: Pillar_Vermitteln_Description
data.value: Courses and workshops for all ages. Mentorships between generations. Languages, culture and practical learning.

data.name: Pillar_Marktplatz_Description
data.value: Flexible work models and community-oriented projects. Implementation of the 23% rule for solidarity financing.

data.name: About_Vision_Text
data.value: The Spinnerei is more than a place – it's a model for living together, working, learning and spiritual growth. At the center is the human being in their wholeness – not just as an employee, but as a feeling, thinking and creative being.

data.name: About_Mission_Text
data.value: We create space, time and trust so that people can unfold, realize ideas and shape community. A place for all generations, cultures and life situations – carried by the idea: Who carries today, will be carried tomorrow.

data.name: Support_23Percent_Description
data.value: The number 23 stands symbolically for voluntary and responsible participation in a community. The more people act, the more people can be carried. It's not about control, but about trust – the central capital of the Spinnerei.

data.name: Support_BGE_Description
data.value: People carried by basic income have no obligations. They receive time and space to find themselves again. Who was carried, later carries others. A chain of trust.

data.name: Beta_Description
data.value: Get early access to our digital platform. Create AI buddies, manage tasks, and connect with the community.

data.name: Beta_Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Become a Beta Tester of the Future

data.name: Beta_Hero_Description
data.value: Get exclusive access to our platform and help us perfect the Bamberger Spinnerei.

data.name: Beta_Benefits_Subtitle
data.value: Discover the advantages of the Beta Program

data.name: Contact_Description
data.value: Have questions or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.

data.name: Index_Hero_Slogan
data.value: Spin your idea. We give you time.

data.name: Index_Hero_Description
data.value: ...who knows you like your best friend. Who knows when you're productive, what motivates you. Who helps you use your time so that you're satisfied in the evening.

data.name: Index_Features_Title
data.value: More than software – a new way of being together

data.name: Index_Features_Description
data.value: We create space for your ideas. Three pillars support our community: Spinning, Teaching, and the Marketplace.

data.name: Index_Features_Zeitsparkasse_Description
data.value: Whether you're trying out a new learning concept, developing an app, or having a vision for sustainable tourism – here you'll find space, materials, and people to accompany you.

data.name: Index_Features_Innovation_Description
data.value: Knowledge isn't lectured here, it's shared. From experienced craftsmen to young entrepreneurs – everyone passes on what they can. No grade pressure, with real encounters.

data.name: Index_Features_Community_Description
data.value: Work self-determined, but not alone. Here you can program and paint, teach in the morning and make music in the evening. Your identity can be multidimensional.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Description
data.value: Three simple steps to your innovation and community participation

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step1_Description
data.value: Create your personal profile, define your skills and interests. Choose whether you want to give or receive time.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step2_Description
data.value: Find suitable projects, teams or mentors. Use our AI-powered matching technology for optimal connections.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step3_Description
data.value: Trade time for time, collect ZeitCoins and build your network. Together we create more.

data.name: Index_Stories_Description
data.value: Real people, real results - how Bamberger Spinnerei changes lives

data.name: Index_Stories_Maria_Quote
data.value: "Through the Time Bank I was able to trade 200 hours of programming for marketing expertise. My startup is now successfully funded!"

data.name: Index_Stories_Hans_Quote
data.value: "As a retired engineer, I pass on my knowledge while learning digital skills. The community keeps me young!"

data.name: Index_CTA_Description
data.value: Become part of a community that understands time as the most valuable resource. Start your journey in Bamberger Spinnerei today.

data.name: Index_News_Description
data.value: Stay updated on the latest developments

data.name: Index_News_ZeitCoin_Description
data.value: The new version of our time currency is live! Improved security, new features and better user experience.

data.name: Index_News_Labs_Description
data.value: Our expanded facilities now offer space for 100+ innovators. State-of-the-art equipment included.

data.name: Index_News_AI_Description
data.value: Peter Paul Clinton discusses the future of work in the AI era. Recording now available.

data.name: Index_Newsletter_Description
data.value: Receive weekly updates on new features, events and community highlights.
